title: Revert appears twice in the popup menu
description: There are two Revert options in the menu.
OB: When opening the popup menu in a Java editor, there is a Revert option before the FORMAT option and another Revert option after the UNDO option.
EB: When opening the popup menu in a Java editor, there should only be one Revert option before the FORMAT option, and it should be disabled. After making the editor dirty, the Revert option should still be disabled.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1) Build F1.1
2) Open a Java editor
3) Make the editor dirty
4) Popup the menu
